entry.title: 4 Pack 7" Pink Silk Hydrangea Kissing Flower Balls
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_1500
Type: Silk Flowers
Price: 21.38 - 162.18 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: High Quality Silk
1 Qty: 4 Kissing Balls
Ball Diameter: 7"
Organza ribbon for easy hanging
Soft and Realistic
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Hydrangea is beautiful flower symbolizing heartfelt and honest emotions, gratitude and thanksgiving. Its distinct stature and radiant hues make it one of the top choices for decorations, embellishment, and crafting. Keeping in consideration their unraveled fame and festive feel, we have crafted their silk imitations in the form of gorgeous kissing balls to provide you a perfect floral decoration with everlasting radiance and perpetual bloom. With our silk kissing balls, you can decorate your ambiance with peace of mind knowing that your kissing balls will always remain fresh and radiant. Accentuate your wedding flowers and decor with these silky, smooth kissing balls. Use these hanging decorations to dress up the wedding aisle, decorate an outdoor arch, or use as an alternative to flower girl baskets. Perfect for both flower girls, and bridesmaids, these undying silk hydrangea kissing balls will be a focal point of your celebrations. Either hang these to create an eye-catching hanging centerpiece, or top these upon tall vases, jars, and bowls for a sophisticated arrangement. Whether you are hosting a garden party, a birthday celebrations, shower event, or a wedding dinner, our gorgeous Pomander Hydrangea kissing balls will bring an elegant and mystic twist to your decorations.

    Additional Information:

    • Material: High Quality Silk
    • 1 Qty: 4 Kissing Balls
    • Ball Diameter: 7"
    • Organza ribbon for easy hanging
    • Soft and Realistic
    • Uses: Weddings, Birthday Parties, Garden Parties, Baby Shower, Engagement, Home Decoration, Anniversaries, Centerpiece Decoration, Hanging Decoration

      • Note: Candles and other decorations are not included
      • For safety precautions we recommend the votive candle holders to be used with an LED tea light. However, regular tea light candles may also be used.
      • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Table Decoration

      Care Instructions:

      • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
      • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer.Â Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens
